    Welcome To My World

    Hi, My name is Azin,
    as long as I remember myself I've always loved creating,no matter what...!
    It could be a piece of jewellery,a needlefelted doll,sculpting in clay,or painting on canvas,would be a new knitting pattern or sewing,cooking a self-made recipe or ...
    now I see web development and design as a new opportunity to be even more creative in a new way, and I've always love to follow new paths and learn new skills every day.
    Creation adds some spices and sparks to my life.
